name: Alchemix
description:
A powerful necromancer is preparing to build an army by taking advantage of an abandoned crypt and it’s spare of body parts. And it’s up to you, a tenacious plague doctor, to use and mix various kinds of reagents at your disposal in order to cleanse the crypt of its evil presence, take down the necromancer and all of her evil minions.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated!

Note: The game is still in a somewhat prototype phase!
